comment.text: This translation key is used to display the label for a "Light theme" option in a theme selection component. It appears on-screen when users are selecting their preferred theme and helps identify the light theme among available options.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'الوضع النهاري' is a possible translation for 'Light theme', a more direct and commonly used translation would be 'النمط الفاتح'. 'الوضع النهاري' implies a daytime mode or setting, which isn't the primary meaning of a light theme in a user interface context.
The translation "ライトのテーマ" is a literal translation and doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'Light theme' in the context of a user interface. It sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 明るいテーマ (Akari Tema) - This is a more natural and common way to refer to a 'light theme' in Japanese user interfaces.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ແສງສະຫວ່າງ ຫົວ​ຂໍ້' is a literal translation of 'light' and 'theme', but it doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Light theme' as a UI setting. A more natural translation would be something like 'ຮູບແບບແສງ' or 'ໂຕ້ອນຮັບແສງສະຫວ່າງ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating as 'ຮູບແບບແສງ' or 'ໂຕ້ອນຮັບແສງສະຫວ່າງ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Gaišs dizains" is a possible translation, it's not the most natural or idiomatic translation of "Light theme". "Gaišs režīms" would be a more accurate and commonly used translation in a technical context.

While "Nền sáng" literally translates to "light background," it doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Light theme" which refers to a user interface theme. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of a light visual style.
